title: Authorize Train Movement
description: A train is ready to depart a siding and enter the main line. A network dispatcher must authorize the movement.

tasks.description: Receive a request from a train crew to occupy the main line from milepost 56 to 78.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives and understands the crew's request.

tasks.description: Check the track diagram to ensure the requested section of track is clear of other trains.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the track block is clear.

tasks.description: Issue a track warrant (authority) to the train for the specified track limits.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal authority is issued and logged.

tasks.description: Remotely align the switch to allow the train to move from the siding to the main line.
tasks.expected_outcome: The switch is correctly aligned, and the signal displays 'Proceed'.
